Package objects

Class Atom

java.lang.Object
objects.Atom
public class Atom extends Object
Class Atom : Stores a Coordinate representing an Atom object + helper methods for dealing with Atoms

    • Atom

      public Atom(int x, int y, int z)
      This constructor generates a new atom and takes a tuple (x,y,z)
      Parameters:
      x - - is the x coordinate
      y - - is the y coordinate
      z - - is the z coordinate
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if location is not present in box

    • generateAtoms

      public static Atom[] generateAtoms(int N)
      This method randomly generates an array of atoms
      Parameters:
      N - - number of atoms to generate
      Returns:
      an array of N randomly generated atoms

    • containsAtom

      public static boolean containsAtom(Atom[] atoms, Coordinate location)
      This method checks if an Atoms array contains an Atom at the specified Coordinate
      Parameters:
      atoms - - array of Atoms
      location - - Coordinate to check
      Returns:
      true - if at least one Atom with the passed location is contained in the atoms array; false - if no Atom with the passed location is contained in the atoms array
